Justin Bieber and his wife Hailey Baldwin stripped down to their underwear to share a steamy kiss as part of a Calvin Klein advert.

The married pair are clearly still basking in that newlywed glow - for the second time round - and want everyone to know about it.

Just days after their wedding in South Carolina , model Hailey, 22, and singer Justin, 25, are seen in the television advert and print campaign playing around and acting up for the camera.

Donning pyjamas for one scene the pair danced and jumped around before the Baby hitmaker picked his wife up and threw her over his shoulder.

(Image: Calvin Klein)

(Image: Glen Lunchford for Calvin Klein)

In the beginning the pair are sat in a living room watching the television wearing their pyjamas, watching a rocket take off on screen.

Then in another black and white artsy shot Justin embraces Hailey picking her up with a hug before pulling her in for a kiss.

The two then dance some more before kissing again.

(Image: Calvin Klein)

(Image: Calvin Klein)

(Image: Calvin Klein)

Jailey are not the only famous faces in the Calvin Klein campaign, as Hailey's old pal Kendall Jenner joins her in her own pair of undies.

She plays about on a flip phone before joining musician A$AP Rocky in a car on the way to Studio 54 nightclub in New York City.

(Image: Calvin Klein)

(Image: Calvin Klein)

They jump out and go into the club where everyone is decked out in their best CK threads.

The new campaign was shared buy the fashion house on Instagram , along with the caption: "Celebrating 50 Years of Unfiltered Self-Expression and Provocation," the caption reads.

(Image: Calvin Klein)

"Travel through the decades with @justinbieber @haileybieber @kendalljenner @asaprocky @troyesivan @liuwenlw and more... Discover the limited-edition capsule at calvinklein.com."

In the print images Justin peers seductively at the camera, while a bare-faced Hailey rests her head on her husband's shoulder.

Celebrating the brand's anniversary the couple also appear in a throwback printed pair of briefs with Justin wrapping his arm around Hailey.
description: Newlyweds Justin and Hailey Bieber stripped down to their underwear as part of the designer brand's new campaign
